register-information: To create your account, we need some information. You are...
docs: How to Prepare My Rental Application

s0.title: Create a Solid Rental Application to Find Your Dream Home
s0.text: DossierFacile helps you create a high-quality digital rental application
s0.text2: to increase your chances of success.

s1.h1: Stand Out with a Quality Application
s1.p1: Provide landlords with a clear, comprehensive, and coherent application to maximize your chances.
s1.h2: Be the First to Respond to a Listing
s1.p2: Be the most responsive by sending your digital application with just one click.
s1.p3: After undergoing rigorous testing by our operators, your application is certified by the government.

s2.title: Create Your Rental Application in Three Steps
s2.p1: DossierFacile asks for the necessary documents and only those!
s2.p2: Our agents verify your application and assist you in making any necessary corrections.
s2.h3: My Application is Ready to be Sent
s2.p3: Your secure application, in the form of a URL link or a PDF file, is ready to be sent to landlords.

s3.title: Protect Your Personal Information
s3.text1: With DossierFacile, no more scattered identification papers!
s3.text2: Your documents are watermarked to protect you from unscrupulous landlords' fraud.
s3.text3: You can customize the access to your application link and delete it at any time!
s3.link: Learn more about data security at DossierFacile

s4.t1: Karim's application stood out immediately: it was the only complete application received!
s4.t2: Simple, efficient, and practical: it saved me a lot of time in my apartment search.
s4.t3: I could never visit an apartment with my foreign application. With DossierFacile, I finally got more viewings!

title: Statistics

404.title: Page not found
404.subtitle: Error 404
404.caption: This is not the web page you are lookingfor.

content.line1: If you typed the web address in the browser, make sure it is correct. The page may no longer be available.
content.line2: In this case, to continue your visit, you can check out our homepage.
content.line3: Otherwise, contact us so that we can redirect you to the right information.
